name: The snatch before christmas
description:
My grandmother used to tell me stories about the old days, a time of peace when the Santa's Christmas elf's kept balance between the Milk Tribes, Sweet Kingdom, Firework Nation, and Ice-cream Nomads. But that all changed when the Sweet Kingdom kidnapped Santa. Only the Christmas elf's mastered all four elements. Only he could stop the ruthless cookies...

3D Artist: https://www.artstation.com/isilven

VFX Artist: https://www.artstation.com/reidenshi

Level Designer: https://www.artstation.com/kontest53

UI/UX: Asagava
